security: The text is redacted because the public disclosure of the redaction could reasonably be expected to constitute an unwarranted invasion of personal privacy, and that invasion of privacy would be so substantial that it outweighs the public interest.
summary: This document is a collection of payroll authorization forms and related correspondence for Elizabeth M. Norris (later Brown) during her time working for the HSCA, including her social security number (redacted), salary, and employment dates.
summary_one_paragraph: This collection of documents pertains to Elizabeth M. Norris/Brown's employment with the House Select Committee on Assassinations (HSCA). It includes payroll authorization forms detailing her appointments, salary adjustments, and termination, along with a memo from Tom Howarth recommending her hiring. The documents also contain information about her qualifications, relationship to members of Congress, and a notification regarding the postponement of the release of her Social Security number due to privacy concerns. The forms are signed by Louis Stokes, Chairman of the HSCA, and cover the period from September 1977 to November 1978.
title: Final Determination Notification & Staff Payroll Records for Elizabeth M. Norris
recipient: Clerk of the House of Representatives
